title: World Server DC
body: My last ranked game about 2 hours ago now, the game was going fine until everyone in the entire game kept dcing for several minutes and such, we all kept dcing about once every 30 seconds. However we did not recieve a loss prevented for this? How come, was it just my isolated match or the entire server?

replies.body: Could you please post which game it was as this might help a Rioter look at why the server had a hickup.
Was it when the patch was released? I don't believe they activate loss prevented for something like that.
